conversation.text: And glad to see you found it! You didn't damage it, right?
It uhh... Well whatever, at least its back in my hands.
Here's a reward for your menial efforts.
You know, this is the first time I've seen the sun...
At least since I was a kid.
[outline_size=8][outline_color=yellow]You got a handful of some coins!
[outline_size=8][outline_color=yellow]They seem to have a picture of a full moon on one side, and what looks to be a face on the other.
